content.metaTitle: Villa Chloe: New Build Villa Jávea | 4 Bed €1,285,000
content.metaDescription: Luxury new build villa in exclusive Monte Olimpo, Jávea. 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 1000m² plot. Just 7 minutes from Arenal beach. Ready to move in.
content.heroIntro:
Nestled in the exclusive Monte Olimpo residential enclave of Jávea, Villa Chloe represents the pinnacle of contemporary Mediterranean living. This stunning new build villa combines modern architectural elegance with the timeless appeal of the Costa Blanca, positioned just seven minutes from the golden sands of Arenal beach - one of Spain's most coveted coastal destinations.

Spanning two thoughtfully designed floors across a generous 1000m² plot, Villa Chloe offers four beautifully appointed bedrooms and three luxurious bathrooms within 165m² of meticulously crafted living space. The property showcases an exceptional open-concept design that seamlessly integrates indoor and outdoor living, featuring expansive floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the interiors with natural light while framing captivating views of the private pool and landscaped gardens. Delivered turnkey by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana S.L., this architectural gem promises effortless luxury living from day one.

locationSection.intro:
The Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea represents one of the Costa Blanca's most prestigious addresses, where Mediterranean authenticity meets modern sophistication. This elevated location in Monte Olimpo offers residents the perfect balance of tranquil residential privacy and convenient access to Jávea's vibrant amenities, with the historic old town, bustling port, and pristine beaches all within easy reach.

Jávea's unique microclimate, protected by the dramatic Montgó mountain range, ensures over 320 days of sunshine annually and mild winter temperatures that make year-round living a pleasure. The area's exceptional infrastructure, international community, and proximity to Alicante airport (90km) and Valencia (110km) make it equally appealing for permanent residents, second-home owners, and investors seeking premium rental yields.
highlights: Just 7 minutes' drive to the renowned Arenal beach with its golden sand and crystal-clear waters
Walking distance to local amenities including restaurants, shops, and essential services
15 minutes to Jávea's historic old town with its traditional Thursday market and authentic Spanish charm
Close proximity to world-class golf courses including Club de Golf Jávea and La Sella Golf Resort
Easy access to scenic hiking trails in the Montgó Natural Park and coastal cliff walks

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Chloe exemplifies contemporary design excellence, where every element has been carefully selected to create a harmonious blend of luxury, functionality, and effortless Mediterranean lifestyle. The property's intelligent layout maximizes natural light and outdoor connectivity while ensuring complete privacy and comfort for residents and guests alike.
features: Open-concept living space integrating kitchen, dining, and living areas with seamless outdoor flow
Master bedroom suite with en-suite bathroom and private terrace access for ultimate privacy
Three additional bedrooms, each with fitted wardrobes and premium finishes throughout
Three contemporary bathrooms featuring high-end fixtures and elegant tiling
Fully equipped modern kitchen with premium appliances and sleek cabinetry
Private swimming pool set within beautifully landscaped gardens requiring minimal maintenance
Multiple outdoor terraces and covered areas perfect for al fresco dining and entertaining
High-quality construction with superior insulation and energy-efficient systems
Turnkey delivery including all furnishings, landscaping, and move-in ready condition
Private parking and storage areas within the generous 1000m² plot

content.investmentSection:
Jávea's luxury property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and consistent growth, with new build villas in prime locations like Monte Olimpo commanding strong capital appreciation and exceptional rental yields. The area's limited supply of premium properties, combined with increasing international demand from discerning buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean lifestyle, positions Villa Chloe as an outstanding investment opportunity with projected annual rental yields of 6-8% for luxury vacation rentals.

The property's turnkey condition, premium location just minutes from Arenal beach, and appeal to both permanent residents and holidaymakers ensures strong rental demand throughout the extended Mediterranean season. With Jávea's growing reputation as a sophisticated alternative to the busier resorts of the Costa Blanca, early investors in premium properties like Villa Chloe are well-positioned to benefit from the area's continued gentrification and the increasing affluence of its international community.
whyBuySection: Turnkey luxury villa in exclusive Monte Olimpo location - ready for immediate enjoyment
Just 7 minutes from Arenal beach, one of Spain's most beautiful sandy beaches
Premium new build construction by reputable developer Miralbo Urbana S.L. with full guarantees
Exceptional rental investment potential with projected yields of 6-8% annually
Low-maintenance landscaped gardens and modern systems for effortless ownership
Growing international community and sophisticated local amenities
Excellent connectivity to major airports while maintaining peaceful residential setting

faqs.question: What is the total price for Villa Chloe and what payment options are available?
faqs.answer: Villa Chloe is priced at €1,285,000 and is delivered completely finished and ready to move in. We can arrange flexible payment schedules and assist with mortgage applications through our trusted financial partners. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of the property value for non-residents.

faqs.question: How far is Villa Chloe from Jávea's beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is just 7 minutes' drive from the famous Arenal beach, while the historic old town and port area are approximately 15 minutes away. Local amenities including restaurants, supermarkets, and medical services are all within walking distance or a short drive.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange a mortgage for purchasing Villa Chloe?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with specialist mortgage brokers who can arrange competitive financing for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% LTV for non-residents, and we can connect you with English-speaking mortgage advisors to guide you through the process.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for Villa Chloe as an investment property?
faqs.answer: Premium villas in this location typically achieve annual rental yields of 6-8% through vacation rentals. The property's proximity to Arenal beach, turnkey condition, and luxury finishes make it highly attractive to discerning holidaymakers, ensuring strong bookings throughout the extended Mediterranean season.

faqs.question: When will Villa Chloe be completed and ready for handover?
faqs.answer: Villa Chloe is delivered turnkey and ready for immediate occupation. The property comes fully furnished, with completed landscaping and all systems tested and operational, allowing you to start enjoying your new home from day one.

faqs.question: What exactly is included in the Villa Chloe purchase price?
faqs.answer: The purchase price includes the fully finished villa, all high-end fixtures and fittings, fully equipped kitchen, complete bathroom installations, fitted wardrobes, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, and all exterior works. The property is delivered turnkey with nothing additional required.

faqs.question: What are the ongoing costs of owning Villa Chloe?
faqs.answer: Annual costs typically include local property tax (IBI), utility bills, pool maintenance, and garden upkeep. The property has been designed for minimal maintenance with high-quality materials and efficient systems, keeping ongoing costs reasonable for a luxury villa of this caliber.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa Chloe?
faqs.answer: We can arrange private viewings at your convenience, including virtual tours for international buyers. Contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or email to schedule your visit and we'll be happy to show you the property and surrounding area.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for purchasing Villa Chloe as a foreign buyer?
faqs.answer: The process involves making a reservation, conducting due diligence, signing the private contract with deposit (typically 10%), and completing at a Spanish notary. We guide international buyers through each step, including NIE number applications, bank account setup, and connecting with English-speaking legal representatives.

content.conclusion: Villa Chloe represents an exceptional opportunity to secure a luxury new build villa in one of Jávea's most desirable locations, combining contemporary design excellence with the authentic charm of Mediterranean coastal living. With its turnkey delivery, premium finishes, and unbeatable location just minutes from Arenal beach, this property offers both an enviable lifestyle and strong investment potential. Contact us today via WhatsApp at +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and discover why Villa Chloe could be your perfect Costa Blanca home.
